name: EastIndianDesserts
description: Delicate sweets from East India, rich in jaggery, milk, and coconut flavors.

name: NorthIndianDesserts
description: A rich collection of traditional North Indian sweets made with pure ghee, aromatic spices, and age-old recipes. From indulgent gulab jamuns to festive kaju katli, these desserts capture the authentic flavors of the north.

name: WestIndianDesserts
description: Flavors from the West of India, from Goan bebinca to Gujarati basundi.

name: SouthIndianDesserts
description: Traditional South Indian sweets with coconut, jaggery, and cardamom.

name: Cakes
description: Soft, fluffy cakes for every occasion, baked fresh to perfection.

name: Cupcakes
description: Mini delights packed with flavor, perfect for any celebration.

name: Brownies
description: Rich and fudgy brownies that melt in your mouth.

name: Donuts
description: Fluffy donuts with a variety of glazes and toppings.

name: Truffles
description: Crisp crusts filled with sweet and tangy flavors.

name: IceCreams
description: Creamy, chilled scoops in irresistible flavors.

name: FrenchDesserts
description: Elegant French pastries and sweets with timeless charm.

name: ItalianDesserts
description: Classic Italian treats from tiramisu to panna cotta.

name: MiddleEastDesserts
description: Sweet flavors of the Middle East, rich in nuts and honey.

name: JapaneseDesserts
description: Delicate Japanese confections with unique textures.

name: ClassicFavorites
description: All-time favorite desserts loved by everyone.

name: ChocolateHeaven
description: A paradise for chocolate lovers with rich, indulgent treats.

name: FunAndColourful
description: Bright and playful desserts that bring joy to any event.

name: ChilledTreats
description: Cool and refreshing desserts to beat the heat.

name: DiwaliSpecials
description: Traditional Indian sweets to light up your Diwali celebrations.

name: ChristmasSpecials
description: Festive desserts to sweeten your Christmas celebrations.

name: EidSpecials
description: Celebratory sweets to mark the joy of Eid.

name: WeddingSpecials
description: Elegant and luxurious desserts for weddings.

name: BabyShowerSpecials
description: Adorable themed treats perfect for baby showers.

name: BirthdaySpecials
description: Fun and festive desserts to make birthdays extra sweet.
